<button onMouseover=\"console.log('mouseover')\" type=\"button\">Button C</button> <button hx-on::click=\"alert('clicked inline')\" type=\"button\">Button D</button> 
<button hx-on::click=\"
\" type=\"button\">Button E</button>

\">Button F</button>

\"
